7. Wasps were incensed that Hughes had been suspended and their dismay was shared by others.

9. Hughes is unlikely to play again until the visit of Exeter to Coventry on April 26.
10. The appeal panel chairman said that they heard the matter afresh and had the advantage of evidence not before the original panel, concluding that no act of foul play took place.
